step_bound_pos_iff:
theorem step_bound_pos_iff {n : ℕ} : 0 < step_bound n ↔ 0 < n :=
  zero_lt_mul_right <| by positivity
#align step_bound_pos_iff step_bound_pos_iff
step_bound_mono:
theorem step_bound_mono : Monotone step_bound := fun a b h =>
  nat.mul_le_mul h <| Nat.pow_le_pow_of_le_right (by norm_num) h
#align step_bound_mono step_bound_mono
seven_le_initial_bound:
theorem seven_le_initial_bound : 7 ≤ initial_bound ε l :=
  le_max_left _ _
#align seven_le_initial_bound seven_le_initial_bound
pow_mul_m_le_card_part:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
theorem pow_mul_m_le_card_part (hP : P.is_equipartition) (hu : u ∈ P.parts) :
    (4 : exprℝ) ^ P.parts.card * exprm ≤ u.card := by
  norm_cast
  rw [step_bound, ← nat.div_div_eq_div_mul]
  exact (Nat.mul_div_le _ _).trans (hP.average_le_card_part hu)
#align pow_mul_m_le_card_part pow_mul_m_le_card_part
one_le_m_coe:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
theorem one_le_m_coe [Nonempty α] (hPα : P.parts.card * 16 ^ P.parts.card ≤ card α) : (1 : exprℝ) ≤ exprm :=
  Nat.one_le_cast.2 <| m_pos hPα
#align one_le_m_coe one_le_m_coe
mul_sq_le_sum_sq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem mul_sq_le_sum_sq (hst : s ⊆ t) (f : ι → 𝕜)
    (hs :
      x ^ 2 ≤
        (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (f i) /
            s.card) ^
          2)
    (hs' : (s.card : 𝕜) ≠ 0) :
    (s.card : 𝕜) * x ^ 2 ≤
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t (f i ^ 2) :=
  (mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left (hs.trans sum_div_card_sq_le_sum_sq_div_card) <| Nat.cast_nonneg _).trans <|
    (mul_div_cancel' _ hs').le.trans <| sum_le_sum_of_subset_of_nonneg hst fun i _ _ => sq_nonneg _
#align mul_sq_le_sum_sq mul_sq_le_sum_sq
m_pos:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
theorem m_pos [Nonempty α] (hPα : P.parts.card * 16 ^ P.parts.card ≤ card α) : 0 < exprm := by positivity
#align m_pos m_pos
le_step_bound:

theorem le_step_bound : id ≤ step_bound := fun n => Nat.le_mul_of_pos_right <| pow_pos (by norm_num) n
#align le_step_bound le_step_bound
le_initial_bound:
theorem le_initial_bound : l ≤ initial_bound ε l :=
  (le_max_left _ _).trans <| le_max_right _ _
#align le_initial_bound le_initial_bound
le_bound:
theorem le_bound : l ≤ bound ε l :=
  (le_initial_bound ε l).trans <| initial_bound_le_bound ε l
#align le_bound le_bound
initial_bound_pos:
theorem initial_bound_pos : 0 < initial_bound ε l :=
  Nat.succ_pos'.trans_le <| seven_le_initial_bound _ _
#align initial_bound_pos initial_bound_pos
initial_bound_le_bound:
theorem initial_bound_le_bound : initial_bound ε l ≤ bound ε l :=
  (id_le_iterate_of_id_le le_step_bound _ _).trans <| Nat.le_mul_of_pos_right <| by positivity
#align initial_bound_le_bound initial_bound_le_bound
hundred_lt_pow_initial_bound_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem hundred_lt_pow_initial_bound_mul {ε : exprℝ} (hε : 0 < ε) (l : ℕ) : 100 < 4 ^ initial_bound ε l * ε ^ 5 :=
  by
  rw [← rpow_nat_cast 4, ← div_lt_iff (pow_pos hε 5), lt_rpow_iff_log_lt _ zero_lt_four, ← div_lt_iff, initial_bound,
    Nat.cast_max, Nat.cast_max]
  · push_cast
    exact lt_max_of_lt_right (lt_max_of_lt_right <| Nat.lt_floor_add_one _)
  · exact log_pos (by norm_num)
  · exact div_pos (by norm_num) (pow_pos hε 5)
#align hundred_lt_pow_initial_bound_mul hundred_lt_pow_initial_bound_mul
hundred_le_m:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
theorem hundred_le_m [Nonempty α] (hPα : P.parts.card * 16 ^ P.parts.card ≤ card α)
    (hPε : 100 ≤ 4 ^ P.parts.card * ε ^ 5) (hε : ε ≤ 1) : 100 ≤ exprm := by
  exact_mod_cast
    (hundred_div_ε_pow_five_le_m hPα hPε).trans'
      (le_div_self (by norm_num) (by positivity) <| pow_le_one _ (by positivity) hε)
#align hundred_le_m hundred_le_m
hundred_div_ε_pow_five_le_m:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
theorem hundred_div_ε_pow_five_le_m [Nonempty α] (hPα : P.parts.card * 16 ^ P.parts.card ≤ card α)
    (hPε : 100 ≤ 4 ^ P.parts.card * ε ^ 5) : 100 / ε ^ 5 ≤ exprm :=
  (div_le_of_nonneg_of_le_mul (eps_pow_five_pos hPε).le (by positivity) hPε).trans
    (by
      norm_cast
      rwa [Nat.le_div_iff_mul_le' (step_bound_pos (P.parts_nonempty <| univ_nonempty.ne_empty).card_pos), step_bound,
        mul_left_comm, ← mul_pow])
#align hundred_div_ε_pow_five_le_m hundred_div_ε_pow_five_le_m
eps_pow_five_pos:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem eps_pow_five_pos (hPε : 100 ≤ 4 ^ P.parts.card * ε ^ 5) : 0 < ε ^ 5 :=
  pos_of_mul_pos_right ((by norm_num : (0 : exprℝ) < 100).trans_le hPε) <| pow_nonneg (by norm_num) _
#align eps_pow_five_pos eps_pow_five_pos
eps_pos:
theorem eps_pos (hPε : 100 ≤ 4 ^ P.parts.card * ε ^ 5) : 0 < ε :=
  pow_bit1_pos_iff.1 <| eps_pow_five_pos hPε
#align eps_pos eps_pos
coe_m_add_one_pos:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem coe_m_add_one_pos : 0 < (exprm : exprℝ) + 1 := by positivity
#align coe_m_add_one_pos coe_m_add_one_pos
card_aux₂:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expra -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
theorem card_aux₂ (hP : P.is_equipartition) (hu : u ∈ P.parts) (hucard : ¬u.card = exprm * 4 ^ P.parts.card + expra) :
    (4 ^ P.parts.card - (expra + 1)) * exprm + (expra + 1) * (exprm + 1) = u.card :=
  by
  have : exprm * 4 ^ P.parts.card ≤ card α / P.parts.card :=
    by
    rw [step_bound, ← nat.div_div_eq_div_mul]
    exact nat.div_mul_le_self _ _
  rw [nat.add_sub_of_le this] at hucard
  rw [(hP.card_parts_eq_average hu).resolve_left hucard, mul_add, mul_one, ← add_assoc, ← add_mul,
    nat.sub_add_cancel a_add_one_le_four_pow_parts_card, ← add_assoc, mul_comm, nat.add_sub_of_le this, card_univ]
#align card_aux₂ card_aux₂
card_aux₁:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expra -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expra -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprm -/
theorem card_aux₁ (hucard : u.card = exprm * 4 ^ P.parts.card + expra) :
    (4 ^ P.parts.card - expra) * exprm + expra * (exprm + 1) = u.card := by
  rw [hucard, mul_add, mul_one, ← add_assoc, ← add_mul,
    nat.sub_add_cancel ((nat.le_succ _).trans a_add_one_le_four_pow_parts_card), mul_comm]
#align card_aux₁ card_aux₁
bound_pos:
theorem bound_pos : 0 < bound ε l :=
  (initial_bound_pos ε l).trans_le <| initial_bound_le_bound ε l
#align bound_pos bound_pos
add_div_le_sum_sq_div_card:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem add_div_le_sum_sq_div_card (hst : s ⊆ t) (f : ι → 𝕜) (d : 𝕜) (hx : 0 ≤ x)
    (hs :
      x ≤
        |finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (f i) /
              s.card -
            finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t (f i) /
              t.card|)
    (ht :
      d ≤
        (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t (f i) /
            t.card) ^
          2) :
    d + s.card / t.card * x ^ 2 ≤
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t (f i ^ 2) /
        t.card :=
  by
  obtain hscard | hscard := (s.card.cast_nonneg : (0 : 𝕜) ≤ s.card).eq_or_lt
  · simpa [← hscard] using ht.trans sum_div_card_sq_le_sum_sq_div_card
  have htcard : (0 : 𝕜) < t.card := hscard.trans_le (Nat.cast_le.2 (card_le_of_subset hst))
  have h₁ :
    x ^ 2 ≤
      (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (f i) /
            s.card -
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t (f i) /
            t.card) ^
        2 :=
    sq_le_sq.2 (by rwa [abs_of_nonneg hx])
  have h₂ :
    x ^ 2 ≤
      (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s
            (f i -
              finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t (f j) /
                t.card) /
          s.card) ^
        2 :=
    by
    apply h₁.trans
    rw [sum_sub_distrib, sum_const, nsmul_eq_mul, sub_div, mul_div_cancel_left _ hscard.ne']
  apply (add_le_add_right ht _).trans
  rw [← mul_div_right_comm, le_div_iff htcard, add_mul, div_mul_cancel _ htcard.ne']
  have h₃ :=
    mul_sq_le_sum_sq hst
      (fun i =>
        f i -
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t (f j) /
            t.card)
      h₂ hscard.ne'
  apply (add_le_add_left h₃ _).trans
  simp [← mul_div_right_comm _ (t.card : 𝕜), sub_div' _ _ _ htcard.ne', ← sum_div, ← add_div, mul_pow,
    div_le_iff (sq_pos_of_ne_zero _ htcard.ne'), sub_sq, sum_add_distrib, ← sum_mul, ← mul_sum]
  ring_nf
#align add_div_le_sum_sq_div_card add_div_le_sum_sq_div_card
a_add_one_le_four_pow_parts_card:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `expra -/
theorem a_add_one_le_four_pow_parts_card : expra + 1 ≤ 4 ^ P.parts.card :=
  by
  have h : 1 ≤ 4 ^ P.parts.card := one_le_pow_of_one_le (by norm_num) _
  rw [step_bound, ← nat.div_div_eq_div_mul, ← nat.le_sub_iff_right h, tsub_le_iff_left, ← nat.add_sub_assoc h]
  exact Nat.le_pred_of_lt (Nat.lt_div_mul_add h)
#align a_add_one_le_four_pow_parts_card a_add_one_le_four_pow_parts_card
